description: Regolith filter for generating JSON files from TypeScript templates (single or multiple) for Minecraft Bedrock Edition.

include.description: Glob pattern(s) to scan for template .ts files. Paths are relative to temp workspace; 'packs/' prefix is automatically stripped if present.

exclude.description: Glob pattern(s) to exclude from scanning.

pretty.description: Pretty-print generated JSON (four-space indentation). If false, outputs minified JSON.
